item.title: Has The ARC Raiders Server Slam Playtest Been Extended? When Does The Playtest End?
item.content:encoded:
It‚Äôs no secret how popular ARC Raiders has been all year. The extraction shooter has undergone a bunch of playtests and betas, and the Server Slam open beta arrived just before launch. If you‚Äôre wondering whether the latest ARC Raiders playtest is still going, when it ends, and if there‚Äôs another on the way, we‚Äôve got answers to every question.

You only have to look at how many playtests Embark Studios has conducted this year to see how steadfast the developer is in its desire to get ARC Raiders right. Escape From Tarkov is finally ready for its 1.0 release, but this has possibly been pushed forward by the success and interest in ARC Raiders‚Äîits new extraction shooter competition.

If you‚Äôve enjoyed the Server Slam playtest and want to play more, we‚Äôve got details on the beta and the game‚Äôs future.

Is The ARC Raiders Server Slam Playtest Over?

The ARC Raiders Server Slam Playtest officially ended on October 20, and confirmation came from official ARC Raiders social media to end all hopes of the beta being extended.

There‚Äôs always an optimistic instinct in all of us that we might get more. An extra day off, a bit more money in a paycheck, or anything equivalent. That was the feeling in the ARC Raiders community with the Server Slam test. Even though this was a last-minute beta before launch, the thought of waiting nearly two weeks for the game is probably an eternity.

We‚Äôve seen people frantically looking up to see if the playtest had been extended. This is where we break your heart and say that this particular beta has conclusively ended.

Will There Be Another ARC Raiders Playtest?

Embark Studios‚Äô stance is that the Server Slam playtest was the final beta of any sort before ARC Raiders finally launches on October 30.

Here‚Äôs what the official ARC Raiders account on X had to say: ‚ÄúThe Server Slam has now officially ended. Thank you so much for joining us to test the servers before the big day. Speranza awaits you on October 30th, Raiders!‚Äù

As you can see, there‚Äôs no mention of a final final playtest. It‚Äôs safe to say we‚Äôre ready to go for launch. It‚Äôs been a long journey to get there‚Äîwhat the delay and all‚Äîbut, hopefully, it‚Äôs all worth it!

Could the team spring one final playtest on us as a tease? If they do, you know where to go to find out: Here on the Insider Gaming official website, or by keeping up with the wider IG community via the Insider Gaming Discord.

item.title: ARC Raiders Price Explained‚ÄîWill ARC Raiders Be Free To Play?
item.content:encoded:
Embark Studios is bringing serious competition to the extraction shooter genre in 2025 with ARC Raiders. The futuristic shooter has all the hallmarks of a classic PvPvE experience, and it would score more points if it were free to play and didn‚Äôt have a price to pay.

ARC Raiders became Steam‚Äôs most popular Extraction Shooter with the release of its final test phase before launch‚Äîthe open beta Server Slam Test. Developer Embark Studios (known for The Finals) has worked very hard to ensure it learns from its mistakes and stands a chance of survival at release.

One way to get more people on board is to make ARC Raiders free-to-play. Foregoing a price might be a financial gamble, but there would be benefits. Let‚Äôs raid the information cabinet for you.

Is ARC Raiders Free-to-Play?

ARC Raiders will not be a free-to-play online multiplayer experience, and you will have to pay an initial one-time fee to set foot in Speranza and beyond!

There‚Äôs a definite line in the sand when it comes to online shooters now: Those that are free-to-play, and those that want a fee upfront. Naturally, games like Concord have only stoked the fires of the debate more. When you have a Warzone, a Fortnite, a Marvel Rivals, or an Apex Legends charging nothing to play the base game, it‚Äôs only natural to question if other new releases should follow suit.

However, EA and Embark Studios have decided against making ARC Raiders free-to-play. It doesn‚Äôt mean it won‚Äôt make the transition in the future, but for now, you need to dip into your pockets to play it.

ARC Raiders Price, Explained

The base edition of ARC Raiders costs $39.99 or ¬£30.99, whereas you need to stump up $59.99 or ¬£49.99 for the more expensive Deluxe Edition.

Obviously, you don‚Äôt need to buy the upgraded version, but the Deluxe Edition content and bonus rewards are pretty tempting. The Standard Edition offers the thing you‚Äôre after the most‚Äîthe game. If you go early, you might even be able to get your hands on the ARC Raiders pre-order bonuses.

Here‚Äôs a mini-breakdown of what‚Äôs included in each edition of the game, and a reaffirmation of the cost.

Whether you‚Äôre a beginner or a daily player, today‚Äôs tips and strategies can help you solve it faster and maintain your streak‚Äîif you‚Äôre open to a little extra help. How To Play Wordle

Wordle is a simple but addictive word puzzle. Each day, players have to guess a five-letter word answer in no more than six attempts. After each guess:

  • Green letters are correct and in the right position.
  • Yellow letters are correct, but in the wrong position.
  • Gray letters are not in the word at all.

The goal is to guess the word in as few tries as possible. Daily puzzles keep players coming back for more, making it a fun brain exercise and a trending topic online.

Wordle can only be played on the New York Times website. There currently isn‚Äôt an app for you to download the official game.

Wordle Hints For Today, October 21, 2025

Without giving today‚Äôs Wordle answer completely away, here are a few helpful hints for today to get you started:

Use these clues to narrow down your guesses and increase your chances of solving Wordle #1585 for October 21, 2025

Answer: DETOX

Yesterday‚Äôs Wordle Answer

While not always the case, looking at previous words can sometimes give you insight into common patterns or letter usage in Wordle puzzles. Reminder, you can check out every past Wordle answer in our official archive.

When Is The Next Wordle Game After #1585?

Wordle games are updated daily at 12am or Midnight in your respective time zone. Information about the next game is often available in the hours before to give players a heads up. The game on October 22 will be Wordle Game #1586.

What Is Wordle?

Wordle is a daily word puzzle created by Josh Wardle. Initially developed as a prototype in 2013, it wasn‚Äôt fully released until 2021. The game tasks players with guessing a five-letter word in six tries or fewer, using hints from each attempt to narrow down the answer. Its straightforward concept, accessibility, and the thrill of solving a new puzzle each day helped it surge in popularity by late 2021. The success of Wordle inspired numerous spin-offs and social media challenges, leading to its acquisition by The New York Times in early 2022.

item.title: Xbox President Confirms Series X/S Successors Are in Development
item.content:encoded:
Xbox President has confirmed that their next-gen hardware is in development, which means Series X/S successors are on the way.

Xbox has been going strong with its ‚ÄòThis is an Xbox‚Äô campaign, bringing its services to all possible platforms. They have already entered the handheld business successfully with the launch of ROG Xbox Ally X and are now looking at bringing Xbox to cars with their new partnership with LG.

With so many platforms being addressed by Xbox, many players were wondering whether their next mainline consoles are getting any attention. Fortunately, the president has stated that development is already on, and they have reached the prototype and design stage of things.

Xbox Series X/S Successors Are in the Prototyping and Designing Stage

During a new interview with Variety (via The Gamer), Xbox President Sarah Bond was asked whether they are still going to make in-house consoles, to which she replied, confirming that the successors of Series X/S are in development.

Bond stated that they are ‚Äú100% looking at making things in the future.‚Äù Their next-gen hardware is already in development, and the team has ‚Äúbeen looking at prototyping, designing.‚Äù The president also spoke about the AMD partnership around the next-gen consoles.

The Xbox President added that they saw a chance with the ROG Xbox Ally X to ‚Äúinnovate in a new way and to bring gamers another choice, in addition to our next-gen hardware.‚Äù Bond spoke about ‚Äúlistening to what players and creators want‚Äù and bulding thing when ‚Äúthere is demand for innovation.‚Äù

Bond concluded by talking but more innovation that is too come, including towards ‚Äúfurther optimizing the experience‚Äù for handhelds, scaling out the compatability program, bringing more benefits and improvements, and offering more features to people that give them ‚Äúmore choices and more games.‚Äù

In other news, Microsoft is reportedly moving Surface manufacturing out of China and could do the same with Xbox later. Additionally, here‚Äôs Insider Gaming‚Äôs Asus ROG Xbox Ally X review.
